trans:
4 km to Krakow's Błonia
a dozen or so minutes to the Newton, Edison, Galileo office buildings
near the Pedagogical University and the AGH Student Campus
Nearby bakery, pizzeria, numerous shops and service points
Communication
The nearest public transport stop: Bronowice
Buses: 664
Trams: 4, 8, 13, 14, 24
About the building
Apartment size: 87 m
Apartment on the ground floor
Spacious and well-kept staircase
5-story block
Gated estate with a barrier
Rooms
2 independent rooms
Living room
Kitchen
Bathroom plus separate toilet
Hallway
Wardrobe
Equipment
Fully furnished apartment
Details
Floor: 0 out of 5
Elevator: yes
Balcony: yes
Cell tenant
Windows: new, plastic, tight
Heating: MPEC
Hot water: MPEC
Gas: no
Parking: on the estate - zone behind the barrier without a number - included in the rental price
Internet connection: yes
Exposure: south
